reviewText:

Get in touch for further details...

The Editorial Review states, "All-region import from China with optional subtitles in English, Chinese, or Japanese." It does not. Japanese subtitles only as noted in the product details.

Four stars for the film, but 1 star for the conflicting descriptions. Since there are multiple import DVDs of this title, this is for ASIN: B00008BOFR.
